actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 94-110.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4592.  An act making appropriations for foreign assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

summary.text: Provides that upon adoption of this resolution, notwithstanding the three-day layover requirement of clause two, rule XXVIII, it shall be in order to consider the conference report on the bill (H.R. 4592) making appropriations for foreign assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, and for other purposes.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4592.  An act making appropriations for foreign assistance and related programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
